name: Core Bore
description:
Keep your drill from falling apart as you dig to the core!

Move with WASD or Arrow Keys, repair panels with Spacebar or Left Click.

(Download the EXE if you experience poor performance with the WebGL version)

This was a Global Game Jam 2020 Entry, created in 48 hours for the theme "Repair"

Jammed at the Sheridan College campus in Oakville, Ontario, Canada!

Credits:

Tyler Stein
Jason Teeuwissen
Edan Abate
Liza Desya
Denys 'Kojah' Podkolzin

Music:
